alert.note: Alert for Bryan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 11:28AM CDT until June 08 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT FOR WESTERN BRYAN COUNTY... At 1128 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles north of Utica to 4 miles northeast of Achille to 3 miles south of Colbert, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Durant, Colbert, Achille, Kemp, Hendrix, Cartwright, Blue, Utica, eastern Lake Texoma and Calera. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
